name: Drumbleat
description:
You are a mountain goat with a song in your heart and a spring in your step.

Climb the icy mountain, jumping on beat for maximum height. Collect upgrades and try not to slip.

controls

Left and Right to move

Up, Z, or X to jump

credits

Coding by Liam Wrubleski @lawruble13

Art by Hannah Zaitlin @entirelybees

Music by Jon Malley @jonathan_malley
